Author: jrbedard
Content: This is a series of really good Podcasts about entrepreneurship given at Stanford Univsersity. Famous entrepreneurs, VCs and engineers share their thoughts about the world of technology. For those of us that are not lucky enough to attend those seminars at Standford :)

Author: jamiequint
Content: I was just talking with somebody a couple weeks ago about something very similar to this. Maybe this could be mixed with an idea like coworking (http://coworking.pbwiki.com/)

Author: Alex3917
Content:
The best things I've learned from previous startup attempts is how to tell good product ideas from bad ones, and the difference between a good product and a good company. The bad news is that now I've weeded out all my own ideas.

I guess I won't be applying this summer.
